db:info.db:title: Qt Quick Controls - Text Editor Example

db:abstract.db:para: A QML app using Qt Quick Controls and a C++ class to provide a fully-functional rich-text editor application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += qml quick TARGET = texteditor !no_desktop: QT += widgets
include(src/src.pri) include(../shared/shared.pri)
OTHER_FILES += \ qml/main.qml \ qml/ToolBarSeparator.qml
RESOURCES += \ resources.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols/controls/texteditor INSTALLS += target
